languages.text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.
languages.original_text: Создает область страха на месте взрыва на 1 раунд. Область страха: все существа в области выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил способность, прошедших проверку или находящихся вне области страха.

traits.locale_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user passed the {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or are outside the zone.

Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the ability user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

languages.text: Erzeugt im Explosionsbereich 1 Runde lang eine Zone der Furcht. Zone der Furcht: Alle Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um die Zone nicht sofort zu verlassen (selbst wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Nutzers der Fähigkeit aus, deren Widerstandsprobe gelungen ist oder die sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Erzeugt im Explosionsbereich 1 Runde lang eine Zone der Furcht. Zone der Furcht: Alle Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich müssen eine {/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um die Zone nicht sofort zu verlassen (selbst wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Nutzers der Fähigkeit aus, deren {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gelungen ist oder die sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.

languages.text: Crée dans le périmètre de la déflagration une zone d'effroi qui dure 1 round. Zone d'effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans la zone doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur qui ont réussi le test ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Crée dans le périmètre de la déflagration une zone d'effroi qui dure 1 round. Zone d'effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans la zone doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.

Crée une Zone d'Effroi de 3 × 3 cases dans la zone d'explosion pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone d'Effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans une zone de 3 × 3 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.

languages.text: 在爆炸范围内创造一片恐惧区域，持续一轮。 恐惧区域：效果区域内的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，通过抗性检定的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 在爆炸范围内创造一片恐惧区域，持续一轮。 恐惧区域：效果区域内的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Crea una zona de miedo en el área de la explosión durante 1 asalto. Zona de miedo: Todas las criaturas situadas en el área deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no salir inmediatamente de esa zona, incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del usuario de la habilidad que hayan superado la prueba de fortaleza o estén fuera de la zona afectada.
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Crea una zona de miedo en el área de la explosión durante 1 asalto. Zona de miedo: Todas las criaturas situadas en el área deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no salir inmediatamente de esa zona, incluso aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del usuario de la habilidad que hayan superado la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} o estén fuera de la zona afectada.

languages.text: 1ラウンドの間、爆発範囲内に恐怖の一帯を作り出す。 恐怖の一帯：エリア内のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功したか、ゾーン外にいる能力使用者の仲間により、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動させる。
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 1ラウンドの間、爆発範囲内に恐怖の一帯を作り出す。 恐怖の一帯：エリア内のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功したか、ゾーン外にいる能力使用者の仲間により、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動させる。

languages.text: Создает область страха на месте взрыва на 1 раунд. Область страха: все существа в области выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил способность, прошедших проверку или находящихся вне области страха.

Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Cоздает Область страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Область страха: все существа в области 3×3 выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} или находящихся вне области страха.

Cоздает Область страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Область страха: все существа в области 3×3 выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} или находящихся вне области страха.

languages.text: Patlama alanında 1 rauntluğuna bir korku bölgesi oluşturur. Korku Bölgesi: Alandaki tüm yaratıklar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlemiş{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç olmuş{/g} olsalar bile anında bölgeden dışarı ilerlerler. Bu hareket; direnç testini geçmiş veya bölgenin dışında bulunan, kabiliyeti kullanan kişinin dost birimlerinden gelecek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetikler.
languages.original_text: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.
